auth_desc.welcome:
Welcome to Diivers,
a place to share who you are today.

sign_up.i_agree_to_the_terms_and_conditions: I agree to the terms and conditions
sign_up.i_agree_to_the_terms_and_privacy: I agree to the terms and privacy
sign_up.consent_to_participate_in_the study: Consent to participate in the study
sign_up.image_size_is_too_large:
Image size is too large.
Please use an image of 400 * 400 or less.

more_about_diivers.desc:
* Diivers services are being used in research by the University of Washington, Information Science (HCI). 
Even if you don't agree with the study, you can sign up for Diivers, and if you click the sign up button, you agree to Diivers' terms and conditions and personal information processing policies.
Only users who agree to use the data for research will receive the following selection information, and the data will be encrypted and managed, not commercially used, and can be used for analysis of research.
If you agree with the study, please enter the additional information below. 
Once again, I would like to inform you that personal information is encrypted and not used for purposes other than research.

account_activate.login_and_tour_diivers: Log in and tour the Diivers

account_dormant.your_account_is_dormant: Diivers puts inactive accounts in dormant status for the protection of customers' valuable information when there has been no usage history for over a year.
account_dormant.you_need_to_reactivate_account: To check the dormant status of your account and recover it, you must go through the personal verification process.
account_dormant.click_email_authenticate_button: Please click the 'Email Authentication' button below.
account_dormant.email_has_been_sent: An authentication email has been sent to the email you provided during Sign Up.
account_dormant.please_check_authentication_email: Please click the link in the authentication email to proceed with account reactivation.
account_dormant.you_can_use_after_reactivation: After the account reactivation, normal use will be possible.

account_reactivate.account_reactivation_is_completed: The account has been successfully reactivated.

question_selection.diivers_recommends_new_questions_every_d: Diivers recommends new questions every day!
